<?php

$dir = ".";

$dh  = opendir($dir);

while (false !== ($filename = readdir($dh))) {

    $files[] = $filename;

}

$ind='index.php';
$dl='download.php';

$v='.';

$vv='..';

sort($files);

foreach ($files as $links) {

 if($files==$ind||$links==$ind||$links==$dl||$links==$v||$links==$vv){

   echo "";

 }else{
   $linkss=ereg_replace("_"," ",$links);

   echo "<a href='$dir/$links'><li>".strtoupper(strtok($linkss,"."))."</a>";

 }

}

?>
